tuv.seg: Office of the Accountant of the Courts of Justice
The Accountant of the Courts of Justice
Is ag Cuntasóir na gCúirteanna Cirte a bhíonn

• is responsible for the receipt, custody, investment and payment out of monies required to be lodged in court either by direction of the High Court or the Supreme Court, by statute or by the Rules of Court
• Freagracht as fáil, caomhnú, infheistiú agus íoc amach airgid a bhíonn le lóisteáil i gcúirt faoi threoir na hArd Cúirte nó na Cúirte Uachtaraigh, faoi reacht nó faoi Rialacha na Cúirte
